tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_components; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_components AS SELECT ac.amp_component_id, ac.title AS component_name, ac.description AS component_description, act.type_id AS component_type_id, act.name AS component_type_name, act.code AS component_type_code FROM amp_components ac JOIN amp_component_type act ON ac.type = act.type_id UNION ALL SELECT 999999999, 'Undefined', 'Undefined', 999999999, 'Undefined', 'Undefined' ORDER BY amp_component_id;
